column4: hey guys, my headphone is not working i did a troubleshoot and here's the result http://www.alsa-project.org/db/?f=ce23df06d74ba1b2c7d8b181eacfdf7b869eb12a, plz guide me what's wrong, it just stopped working suddenly for no apparent reason
have you tried the hda_analyzer script?

intel hda sound has multiple output pins and every laptop is unique in what those pins are attached to. its likely that your headphones are attached to pin 15 but the default assumption is pin 13 (just making those numbers up) and thats why the headphones dont work. hda_analyzer available at the alsa website will allow you to manually play with what output pins are enabled
